Judul: Pb(II) deposition-reduction-growth onto iron nanoparticles induced by graphitic carbon nitride
Abstrak: Enhanced stability and prolonged reactivity of nanoparticles are critical factors for successful applications of the nanoscale zero-valent iron (nZVI) technology. In this work, g-C3N4 was employed as a support for distributing, stabilizing nZVI and further changing the composition, microstructure and electronic structure of nZVI due to the interactions between the iron nanoparticles and g-C3N4 sheet. Adjusting the micro-structure of nZVI to enhance the adsorption ability........
Kata Kunci: nanoscale zero-valent iron (nZVI), g-C3N4, Water treatment
